description: Two 60" flat screens with cable TV, washing machine and dryer,microwave oven, quiet building.
name: Cozy one bedroom apartment
review: Communication with Miles was superb! He replied super quickly all of the time, was very informative about the area and was SUPER accommodating when we had issues getting there in time to check-in. We would definitely stay again. The two TVs were a definite plus and he also has a ton of DVDs. There was a lot to do in the area; We went to Sylvia's Soul Food Restaurant which was only a $5.73 Uber ride away.
